Source

https://digital.nhs.uk/data-and-information/publications/statistical/nhs-talking-therapies-for-anxiety-and-depression-annual-reports

Details

After running nhstt_setup(), this dataset can be accessed directly by running effect_size.

Examples

# \donttest{
nhstt_setup(datasets = "effect_size")
#> 
#> ── NHS Talking Therapies data setup ────────────────────────────────────────────
#> ℹ Downloading: "effect_size"
